name: Timmy on the Toenail Ship
description:
We follow Timmy as he is caught up in a web of dreams stemming from his childish rebellions against his mother and hygiene, combined with his fascination with Norse mythology, forcing him to face his loves along side his hates on the dreaded Toenail Ship Naglfar!

Made By:
